response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is not just a product; it's an experience designed to enhance your daily life. Considering its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it for $125. I understand that everyone has different budgets and needs, so if this price is too high, please let me know your preferred price range, and we can discuss a mutually beneficial arrangement. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 125}
